name: Simply Putting
description:
Here is your chance to putt against the Pros LIVE during the 2019 U.S. Open. Follow your favorite players and attempt their exact putts in real-time as the tournament is happening. An interactive sports experience like never before!

Play on beautiful life like greens as you climb the leaderboard, challenge friends, and complete heart wrenching challenges. Rule the world of putting!

Compete and enjoy multiple game modes:
Play against the Pros by attempting their putts during the 2019 U.S. Open.
Practice your green reading and stake your claim on the various leaderboards.
Challenge your friends in 1v1 or multiplayer matches.
Test your green reading and putting skills with multiple game challenges.

Stoke competition and take your friends Putt Coins by battling in multiplayer matches. Earn Putt Coins by winning matches and conquering a multitude of challenges.


KEY FEATURES:

- Play live against the Pros of your choosing in real-time during the 2019 U.S. Open.
- Practice on holes 7 and 17 before the tournament begins.
- Attempt putts from all the Pros in the 2019 U.S. Open on holes 7 and 17 after the tournament ends.
- Life like putting simulation with realistic ball and green physics.
- True to the game aiming system that’s easy to learn but difficult to master.
- Learn to read breaks with guided arrows.
- Awesome 3D graphics.
- Compete in 1v1 and multiplayer matches with family and friends.
- Earn Putt Coins from completing challenges and winning matches against your Facebook friends.
- Conquer putting challenges in distance, break and timed scenarios.
- Play 6, 9 or 18 holes in each golf game format.
- Practice or compete on easy, medium, hard and pro modes.
- Improve your green reading skills with fun, addictive gameplay.
- Bring your new knowledge right back to the golf course.

Gameplay requires an internet connection.
